title: Taric Jungle WORKS!
body:
{{item:3025}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3709}} 

What are you guys thoughts on jungle Taric

replies.body:
it works because any stupid shit in bronze works


even my sustained fighter annie

I did something weird also, but people may hav already done this:
Braum Jg:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/97481147/200847413?tab=overview

If you're playing against and enemy jungler who is inexperienced and doesnt really know what they are doing then yeah you can play literally anyone in the jungle and make it work, but if your up against a good jungler you will be dead before you clear your first buff, and there wont be shit you can do about it because you're taric, and then they will proceed to make your life hell for the next 20 minutes.
taric loses almost no health when he clears 2 camps @ lvl 1 with w and q lvl 2 and is tanky asf at lvl 1 with w
too much magic resist, swap banshee's for frozen heart or thornmail
Lel, I like chose taric jg for ranked against full AD team, and they were like "troll someone dodge pls". End of game evryone be like "this taric is god".

Into a full ad team maybe somehting more like this. 
{{item:3025}} {{item:3800}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3709}}

Unless your going against an all AD team (in which case drop the MR items) it's not worth the pickup, sure point and click stun, but you can do the same sort of thing on other champions, hell TF can do the same with a stun on an auto, and has about the same sort of clear time.

> [{quoted}](name=Thinker,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=YtkQY9Y4,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-16T23:01:09.235+0000)
>
> {{item:3025}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3709}} 
> 
> What are you guys thoughts on jungle Taric

Taric jungle is amazing. Normally ganking mid is pretty difficult to set up. With taric you just walk in and press e. I used this method once against a zed and forced his flash every single time it was up then took another jungle camp before returning for the kill. As a jungler I keep this guy as a pocket pick against mostly AD teams because of his Armour Aura. This guy is actually extrememly viable in the current jungle even more so than in the support role in my honest opinion.

The stun is gud, cause the stun is longer than u'd think, so the ganks are very affective!
Also his health is very well an advantage in the ally team.
Tried out leona jg, it works well, if u can land ur E :P

The clear and early ganks are pretty good and it's better than most people would probably think. Lategame kinda sucks unless the whole enemy team is diving into you though because he only has a single target cc and cant get even get in range for it half the time (the same reason support taric isn't very popular). I'd definitely put a Righteous glory into your build somewhere to help catch up to people.
